1. Export a Chat in Whatsapp

2. Open it in this app

3. Choose parameters to analyze

Questions and answers: (Scroll through them)

What does the char button do?
->you can choose a single letter to search through all the messages and get the amount

What does the word button do?
->choose a word that you want to search through all the messages

What does the all button do?
->get the amount of all messages and show them in a monthly timeline graph

What does the emoji button do?
->choose an emoji and get the amount of the usage

How can i get a text file to use in this app?
->export the chat in whatsapp by opening a chat and pressing the 3 dots on the right top corner and selecting more and then export chat
